name: ZATM
description:
Helo there guys

This is my first, first person shooter prototype which I've made it for 2019 Global Game Jam.

This game is all about killing zombie dummies with you m4a1. It is a very easy to play game prototype. To win the game avoid the zombies coming to you. Stay close to covers and shoot the zombies with your assault rifle.

To complete the level you have to destroy all of the zombies in the areana.

Don't forget this is only a training mission and they are not real zombies.

Have fun!
